summary.span: 包裝用於組建的已評估項目。

span.span: Wraps an evaluated item for build purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為所有的評估和驗證已執行，則不會儲存項目項目資訊。Does not store item element information, because all evaluation and verification has already been performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個動作會搜尋內建的中繼資料和中繼資料的項目定義，因為此方法適用於批次處理，其中並不重要的中繼資料的起源。This searches built-in metadata and metadata from item definitions, because this method is used for batching, where it doesn't matter where the metadata originated.

summary.span: 將自訂中繼資料項目 (Entry) 複製至其他項目 (Item)。

span.span: Copies the custom metadata entries to another item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當遵循下列方針，實作這個方法。Follow the guidelines below when implementing this method. - 不會覆寫屬性。Do not overwrite the property. - 不會覆寫現有的中繼資料項目。Do not overwrite existing metadata entries. - 請勿複製中繼資料不具意義的目的地項目的項目。Do not copy metadata entries that do not make sense on the destination item.

span.span: Gets or sets the item specification.
The item specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目規格為任意字串。The item specification is an arbitrary string. 如果項目代表磁碟上的檔案，項目規格會是該檔案的路徑。If the item represents a file on disk, the item specification will be the path of that file. 檔案是在專案中的下列項目宣告`File.cs`。The for the following item declaration in a project file is `File.cs`. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個或多個目錄之工作的程式碼。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories. [!code-csharp[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_MakeDirTask/CS/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]
